titles: A plain and necessary confutation of divers gross and antichristian errors, delivered to the vniversity congregation, the last commencement, anno 1653, by Mr. Sydrach Simpson, master of Pembroke Hall in Cambridge
author: Dell, William, d. 1664.
publisher: Printed by Robert White for Giles Calvert ...,
notes: Written by William Dell. Cf. BM.
Appears in: The tryal of spirits. London, 1653 [i.e. 1654].
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
